data.prayer: Father, help your children in Coamo, Puerto Rico find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Coamo, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 23,821 people in the state of Coamo who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: God, guide the 12,485 believers in Coamo to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Coamo, Puerto Rico to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Coamo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Coamo, Coamo, Puerto Rico.
Spirit, encourage the church of Coamo, Puerto Rico that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Coamo, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Coamo.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
